name: quttera
label: Quttera
description: Quttera helps to scan website/domain for malware, ssl and open ports. This connector facilitates automated operations like scan website, get status of scan and get reports of scan etc.

fields.name: server_url
fields.title: Server URL
fields.tooltip: Specify server URL to access Quttera.
fields.description: Specify server URL to access Quttera.

fields.name: api_key
fields.title: API Key
fields.description: Specify API Key to access Quttera.

fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Start URL Scan
operations.description: Scan a domain/website (new scan) for malware.

parameters.name: domain_name
parameters.title: Domain Name
parameters.description: Specify the Domain/URL that you want to scan.

parameters.name: response_format
parameters.title: Response Format
parameters.description: Specify response format. By default, It will be Json.

operations.title: Get Status of URL Scan
operations.description: Get the status of the domain/website scan request from Quttera.

parameters.name: domain_name
parameters.title: Domain Name
parameters.description: Specify the Domain/URL whose scan status you want to fetch.

parameters.name: response_format
parameters.title: Response Format
parameters.description: Specify response format. By default, It will be Json.

operations.title: Get Report of URL Scan
operations.description: Get the detailed scan report of the domain/website from Quttera.

parameters.name: domain_name
parameters.title: Domain Name
parameters.description: Specify the Domain/URL that you want to scan.

parameters.name: response_format
parameters.title: Response Format
parameters.description: Specify response format. By default, It will be Json.

parameters.name: domain_name
parameters.title: Domain Name
parameters.description: Specify the Domain/URL that you want to scan.

parameters.name: response_format
parameters.title: Response Format
parameters.description: Specify response format. By default, It will be Json.

parameters.description: Specify the Domain/URL whose SSL scan status you want to fetch.

parameters.name: response_format
parameters.title: Response Format
parameters.description: Specify response format. By default, It will be Json.

parameters.title: Domain Name
parameters.description: Specify the Domain/URL whose SSL scan report you want to fetch.

parameters.name: response_format
parameters.title: Response Format
parameters.description: Specify response format. By default, It will be Json.

parameters.title: Domain Name
parameters.description: Specify the Domain/URL whose integrity scan you want to start.

parameters.name: response_format
parameters.title: Response Format
parameters.description: Specify response format. By default, It will be Json.

operations.title: Get Status of Integrity Scan
operations.description: Retrieve the status of the domain/website integrity scan request.

parameters.name: domain_name
parameters.title: Domain Name
parameters.description: Specify the Domain/URL whose integrity scan request you want to fetch.

parameters.name: response_format
parameters.title: Response Format
parameters.description: Specify response format. By default, It will be Json.

parameters.description: Specify the Domain/URL whose integrity scan report you want to fetch.

parameters.name: response_format

parameters.description: Specify response format. By default, It will be Json.

operations.title: Start Port Scan
operations.description: Start port scan on specified Domain/URL.

parameters.name: domain_name
parameters.title: Domain Name
parameters.description: Specify the Domain/URL whose port scan you want to start.

parameters.name: response_format
parameters.title: Response Format
parameters.description: Specify response format. By default, It will be Json.

operations.title: Get Status of Port Scan
operations.description: Retrieve the status of the port scanning request.

parameters.name: domain_name
parameters.title: Domain Name
parameters.description: Specify the Domain/URL whose port scan status you want to fetch.

parameters.name: response_format
parameters.title: Response Format
parameters.description: Specify response format. By default, It will be Json.

operations.title: Get Report of Port Scan
operations.description: Retrieve the open ports information report of specified Domain/URL.

parameters.name: domain_name
parameters.title: Domain Name
parameters.description: Specify the Domain/URL whose port scan report you want to fetch.

parameters.name: response_format
parameters.title: Response Format
parameters.description: Specify response format. By default, It will be Json.

operations.title: Get Blacklist Status

parameters.title: Domain Name
parameters.description: Specify the Domain/URL whose blacklist status you want to fetch.

parameters.name: response_format
parameters.title: Response Format
parameters.description: Specify response format. By default, It will be Json.

operations.title: Get Blacklist Report
operations.description: Retrieve the detailed blacklist report of Domain/URL from Quttera.

parameters.name: domain_name
parameters.title: Domain Name
parameters.description: Specify the Domain/URL whose blacklist report you want to fetch.

parameters.title: Response Format
